Description: 2007 Gibson SG Goddess Up for sale is a cool limited edition 2007 Gibson SG Goddess in its original purple-burst finish. Build for roughly a year this guitar features its unique purple-burst finish, 60s neck profile, purple Gibson logo, ebony fingerboard, 490R and 490T pickups w/ purple accents, and a wraparound tailpiece. This one is in excellent condition showing little to no wear and tear. Pro setup in-house and comes complete with its original hardshell case. Year: 2007.Model: SG GoddessSerial: 019870683.Finish: Purple-Burst.Case: Original hardshell case.Weight: 6lbs. 11oz.Condition: Excellent condition.Modifications: None.Comments: Cool and clean '07 SG Goddess in its original Purple-Burst finish!
